1335110.name: Breath of Fire: Dragon Quarter Original Soundtrack
1335110.description:
The original melodies of Capcom's 2003 RPG cult classic Breath of Fire: Dragon Quarter dash onto Steam! Breath of Fire: Dragon Quarter Original Soundtrack makes its Western debut, featuring 47 tunes brimming with Hitoshi Sakimoto's orchestral and electronic style.

The 150+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
